con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:add="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing" xmlns:v1="http://www.telefonica.com/OCS/To2DE/OCS_types/v1_1"> <soapenv:Header> <add:MessageID>http://www.my.com/ferant/profundum</add:MessageID> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <v1:queryBalancesRequest> <v1:subscriberId> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 4 items at this level--> <!--type: E164NumberType--> <v1:e164Number>gero et</v1:e164Number> <!--type: string--> <v1:userName>sonoras imperio</v1:userName> <!--type: anyURI--> <v1:anyURI>http://www.any.org/ventos/verrantque</v1:anyURI> <v1:ipAddress> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <!--type: Ipv4AddressType--> <v1:ipv4Address>per auras</v1:ipv4Address> <!--type: Ipv6AddressType--> <v1:ipv6Address>circum claustra</v1:ipv6Address> </v1:ipAddress> </v1:subscriberId> </v1:queryBalancesRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:call.name: testRequest
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:stac="http://stackservice.pa.o2.de/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <stac:getStackDetailsResponse>\r <!--type: virtualStack - enumeration: [RCS,BCS,PREPAID,SPAIN,HERMES]-->\r <virtualStack>PREPAID</virtualStack>\r <!--type: paymentType - enumeration: [POSTPAID,PREPAID]-->\r <paymentType>PREPAID</paymentType>\r <!--type: subscriptionStatus - enumeration: [ACTIVE,DEACTIVATION_PENDING,DEACTIVATING,INACTIVE]-->\r <subscriptionStatus>ACTIVE</subscriptionStatus>\r <!--type: sasName-->\r <sasName>SP901</sasName>\r </stac:getStackDetailsResponse>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
